website_summaries.verdict: The Parrot Anafi puts all emphasis on size—the small, folding drone is ideal for travel, thanks to 4K video capture, a small airframe, and USB charging.

customer_reviews.title: I was fortunate to come into this when I did
customer_reviews.text: Being new to the drone world, I researched into this and spoke to someone who owned a competitor version. I was fortunate to come into this when I did, as the price of this is incredible for what you get. I've flown this on 30+ flights and being a fan of the high perspectives of life, this new generation of silent, lightweight, responsive controls, crisp video and photographs taking drone is highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Thorniley

customer_reviews.title: Fly Anafi and put a smile on your face
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drone. FAR quieter than my Phantom 4. Smooth flyer and excellent gimbal. Easy to use software is not as complex as DJI, but no worse for being simpler. Flight planner (currently a 99p upgrade) is awesome and intuitive. Update: I have so far clocked up 55 safe flights. Since buying, Parrot have developed and released more firmware updates including 2.7k video, and smart HDR for video and photo modes. November release will bring several new panorama modes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Staib

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent drone for the price range. Feels a little fragile, but that is the cost of its light weight. Holds its position well even in strong winds. Great camera. No problems so far. Knocked a star off because of the in app purchases for the Follow Me and Flight Path features.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to control from straight out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to control from straight out of the box. Easy to setup. The controller is very responsive even for a beginner. Plenty of built in functions on the app too. The downloading of images function didn't work for me so I have to take the memory card out the drone to download footage. The video images are of a professional standard.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie B

customer_reviews.title: Doe not buy - Flew off and fell into a river
customer_reviews.text: I had several issues with this drone, and Amazon replaced it twice. Today it literally flew into a river whilst stationery. There was full GPS, good weather, no obstructions and I had downloaded the map and completed a flight plan. The drone is now gone and Amazon won't replace it or refund it. Parrot's own customer service is beyond awful, it's like you are talking to some AI that doesn't work, but Amazon wasn't interested in helping unless I returned the drone, which they knew from the start I could not as it was no longer in my possession. Stick with other brands and don't bother with this, there is a good chance you will be unlucky.
customer_reviews.author: IAC

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect... But...
customer_reviews.text: Good points.. Light Portable Stable Decent camera Decent flight time Bad points Flew off on two occasions. Once on start up and once while attempting to hand land it. Android app was updated rendering the drone useless with no video feed. Apparently this situation has been resolved now but I was left with an expensive paper weight for over two weeks with little to no feedback from the company. This drone was so close to being perfect but a few hiccups and very poor communication from the manufacturer led to it being returned. Maybe sometime in the future when everything is stable I may try it again..
customer_reviews.author: DDobbin

customer_reviews.title: Useless support and fragile, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: One very minor bump that the device didn’t even register as a crash put it out of action due to one component error. Weeks of circular emails with their support to investigate for possible warranty and finally a bill for most of the new cost of device for a repair. I’m probably not going to throw good money after bad. The other thing I would say is that it’s very restricted as to where you can actually fly these things. So if you really do have somewhere that you can freely and legally fly one, buy a better one than this.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: amazing drone
customer_reviews.text: i could only afford a returns drone.. WOW what an amazing drone ..so i pressed take off and it rose and hovered perfectly . it just stops and sits awaiting your next command .. no need to know anything about flying ..camera and video like something of a david attenborough wildlife film. take off from hand just throw and of it goes. follow me mode outstanding. mapping mode available ..circle you mode available . have only used basic functions at moment .. the price unbeatable for what i would call a professional drone. i may save up and get the headset . no negative comments at all
customer_reviews.author: jane waite

customer_reviews.title: excellent for beginner / post-beginner / enthusiast's
customer_reviews.text: I get awesome video footage, that exceeds my amateur needs, from this drone. My control skills are rubbish so I use 'orbit' 'follow-me' and the inexpensive 'flight plan' features in the Parrot app. I got up to speed with flying a year back with a £100 mjxrc GPS drone. In comparison, the Parrot app and hardware are massively more competent, convenient, safer and confidence building. Your own assessment depends on your starting point. I could have saved that £100 but I wouldn't be as impressed as I am with the Anafi. With a bit more flying experience than zero this drone is going to fulfil my every known need.
customer_reviews.author: RogF

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality was ridiculously incredible, the stability was like a stone in a blizzard, and the battery just didn't drain... but... I bought mine for a trip to Australia and in the first day, three connection inside the controller became loose and I couldn't use it at all.. a few people have had the same issue, and while I'm sure Parrot will fix /replace, it spoiled the entire rain I bought it... don't get me wrong, after seeing the quality of the picture, I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: No customer support and not compatible with Mac
customer_reviews.text: I contacted customer support three times and I never got a response. The videos cannot be played in the app Photos on a Mac and the SD cards are formatted, so they can't be mounted on a Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Carstensen

customer_reviews.title: Known problems - as said by parrot
customer_reviews.text: Photo quality was great however the GPS never connected so safety features like return to home wouldn’t work. After contacting parrot it seems this is a very common issue with these drones and I didn’t have time to replace to see if the next one had the issue or not so I had to refund it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great little drone, very portable and light, easy to charge and fly
customer_reviews.text: It is made of very lightweight materials for a long flight time of about 20 minutes and folds up to be portable in its own carry case. I carry with me a power brick to charge it from between flights in the field. The only downside is that it sometimes forces you to do firmware updates which if you're out and about could mean sitting on the ground with it for 10 minutes before you can fly. Great image quality. It does its best in medium winds to give a stable picture.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice drone
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied with this drone. Picture quality is nice and controlling is easy. Only downside is that it is a WiFi connection. In urban areas there are a lot of interferences so that the range is limited and the connection can be lost. For this case, it is import that drone and remote control have a GPS signal when the drone is started. Then, it will just return to the home position if the connection is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Thorsten

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: On the second flight the memory card gave an SD ERROR message which was very poor - I've owned digital cameras for years and never had an SD ERROR. The controller is patchy at best when it comes to actually connecting to the drone and being able to see the controls via my smart phone. Very disapointing. I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great drone. Buy before CAP1789 takes away all the fun in June 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Great drone. Improvement from Bebop 2, better picture quality and portability but Bebop was more robust. Parrot keep adding extra functions such as recent FPV upgrade. Mine was marketplace buy, no damage, fully tested and much cheaper. Be aware of registration requirements in Nov 19 and follow the dronecode, even when Anafi can get to 1.3km away apparently.
customer_reviews.author: glenview09

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, video fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I have only flown my new Anafi a couple of times and still getting used to it. However, it is extremely easy to fly/control, it's quite quiet and the free app is a doddle to use. I can't fault it, or the service/price from Amazon. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Billy's Grandad

customer_reviews.title: Very light & portable good camera with great flight stability & app is packed full of features.
customer_reviews.text: Small compact design but a very capable quad that holds its height & position well even in windy conditions. Good quality 21 megapixel camera with 4K video & x3 zoom. Great app full of functional features with good flight times It's only weakness is range in urban conditions due to external WiFi interference. Make sure you have correct lead that fits your phone only comes with USB to C lead which is fine for charging but for flying you will need appropriate lead for your phone brand.
customer_reviews.author: Retail therapy

customer_reviews.title: Controller doesn't connect
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 2 different smartphones and several cables. I am only able to fly the drone without the sky controller. Software updates freeze and are never complete. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Very good Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Its my first drone and I was very concerned about picking up the best option compared to its most obvious competitor (which is 100£ more expensive). However, after the first flight I realised that it is a very good drone (easy to fly, trully 20 mnts long flight, cheap spare parts) plus it has a camera with very good quality. Nowadays you can't get more for that money.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drone.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fly. Amazing camera both in stills and video. Compact so easy to carry and take anywhere. With 25mins battery time its perfect for aerial shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Steve.W

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat overpriced but otherwise brilliant little quadcopter. The software is intuitive and comprehensive, range in EU mode restricted, micht get better next March.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: For the price this drone is unbeatable. The flight time is amazing and i love it very much. Yes the mavic 2 pro is way better , but this has a better price/performance.
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: While it's not the same class as the mavic it's also about 1/2 the price
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Compact light weight easy to fly
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. Easy to use Really good camera. Light weight and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Mark the spark.😁😁😁😁

customer_reviews.title: I am already getting some great pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great drone easy to use and set-up. Should come with 2 batterys for the price but think i might be a little bit greedy
customer_reviews.author: Mr N Storey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I would say it's a very good drone. Easy to use. The cover case that comes with it for the drone is amazing. This is my first drone.
customer_reviews.author: Aminul

customer_reviews.title: faulty drone
customer_reviews.text: When I bought the item it never worked. I had to return. Difficult to remove battery to install memory card. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cem

customer_reviews.title: HAD ACCIDENT IN FLIGHT
customer_reviews.text: CONTACTED PARROT CUSTOMER SERVICES APROX 10 DAYS AND HAVE NOT BEEN IN TOUCH SINCE. I THINK PARROT COULD BE MORE HELPFUL,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value against DJI
customer_reviews.text: Given the reduced price its now a bit of a bargain for an occasional. Use top quality drone.
customer_reviews.author: Mr P J Perry

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Took me few hours to safely prepare first test but in the end worked and now I can't wait next morning to fly again :)
customer_reviews.author: Lazar Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Camera WiFi interfearence
customer_reviews.text: Camera well to fragile needs protection also WiFi interfearence makes it crash all reviews on YouTube show this mistake.
customer_reviews.author: shawuk47

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level drone purchase
customer_reviews.text: As a surprise Christmas gift for the OH, this has lived up to expectations - so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jo FKB

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: So many faults on my unit straight from the box makes me suspect that quality control / product testing is non - existent.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Gee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use good camera and makes good photots even if its in the 4:3 aspect ratio
customer_reviews.author: aldis abolins

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Absolute rubbish, massive drifting problems,range of about 200 meters and not the advertised 2k, worst drone I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Mavic Pro

customer_reviews.title: ANAWONTFLY
customer_reviews.text: Total and complete failure. Rarely have I seen such a thorough lack of professionalism in the drone industry. From a device that won't connect to: a) iPad Pro b) iPad Mini 4 c) iPhone Xr . d) iPhone 7 and finally Samsung Galaxy. Parrot customer support makes one long for the DMV or cable company. And finally, Amazon's solution was a phone number in the United Kingdom. I suppose Brexit hasn't happened yet, so maybe I should've tried that number. In any event, don't get this product. If it's unable to even connect to a device, it's guaranteed to lose connection and crash. FAA Licensed sUAS Pilot
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dell

customer_reviews.title: Infant mortality
customer_reviews.text: is what its called when a brand new, off-the-shelf unit fails. The initial unit's camera connection must have been loose inside the drone because it didn't work reliably. It did work once though. It came on while running initial flight tests via the FreeFlight6 app and then promptly stopped working after tapping the "LAND" button on the FF6 app. The Anafi's controller would not turn on at all. Another case of infant mortality. Kudo's to AMAZON for quickly replacing the bad equipment.
customer_reviews.author: ironx

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update: you can't use a fast charger on the skycontroller, it will show a green light but not charge it. Use a normal 1 amp charger. The app won't let you fly the drone without the controller, I don't know if this is because I'm using android or not. But it works well with the controller, after figuring out the not turning on problem. 4 stars until the app is fixed, but otherwise a solid drone.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Return To Home Safety DOES NOT WORK!!!! HAD A FLY-AWAY: NO RESPONSE FROM PARROT
customer_reviews.text: I'm an FAA licensed drone pilot and I've been flying for years. This drone advertises a safety feature that will have the drone return to the takeoff location if it loses connection with the controller, or when it is low on battery. This feature did not work, I was on a commercial job at a landfill with perfect GPS reception. The drone had a fly-away and was never found. No response from Parrot, I have to file with the Attorney General of my state to get my money back; STAY AWAY FROM PARROT!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drone, they hit a sweet spot
customer_reviews.text: Ok so it lacks avoidance sensors and isn't as solid as a Mavic air, but this means it's very light weight and can fly for 20+ minutes. I also own the Phantom 4 Pro and struggle to tell the difference in the picture quality. The USB C charging is so useful, I wouldn't buy another drone with out it. I like the way the Anafi flys, very steady and smooth, the losses zoom is a bonus, the active track is awesome. They've done so many things right, i'm very happy i bought this instead of the Mavic Air, and yes i still have the P4 Pro for when i don't need portability or i'm chasing windsurfers in 30 knot winds.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel L.

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This drone never worked new out of the box. I followed directions and charged everything, updated firmware and calibrated compass. Then nothing. Tried different usb cables and a different phone. Believe it is a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Chris aka MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice drone with plenty of additional features.
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone, takes some very nice photos and video. Easy to operate easy to learn and easy to transport. Plenty of flight time with almost 30minutes of run time and the ability to be recharged with a USB c cable. The arms of the drone seem a little weak afraid I'm going to snap one if I pull in the wrong spot when setting the drone up. GPS failed on mine after a few uses, but after a little chat with support parrot sent me a replacement drone, so no hard feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: This drone is not durable, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: We flew this drone 3 times, and it crashed twice. It was a replacement for a previous Parrot so we had lots of experience; it crashed in flight areas we had used before. The arms cracked, but Parrot said it was operator error, even after we sent in multiple videos and photos. Then we purchased the arm repair kit from Amazon, but we cannot open the original arms to remove the wiring and motors because there are no screws. Parrot customer service was completely unhelpful, they suggested we pay to have our brand new drone fixed. This is not an Amazon issue but a Parrot issue; we will not be purchasing any more Parrot Drones.
customer_reviews.author: carales

customer_reviews.title: Fatal Flaw.  The uscard holder falls off and there is not support.
customer_reviews.text: Fatal Flaw. The uscard holder falls off and there is not support. I have called parrot 10 times over the last two weeks.. Not one person has returned my call.. Were are done with Parrot. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY. ZERO PART SUPPORT FROM PARROT
customer_reviews.text: Fly's great but if you crash it, Parrot does not have replacement pieces in stock to fix. This drone is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for photography, but serviceable
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to use Zoom 180 degree camera Great for real estate video... maybe some stills with good lighting Cons: Poor picture quality - especially in lower light. Even with relatively decent lighting, picture quality is very grainy Have to download the app for follow mode ($0.99) No collision avoidance Poor connection even at less than 1/4 mile
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Drone great, controller garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Drone itself is compact and easy to transport. Pretty simple to fly and great picture. Cons: controller is garbage. First one just quit working after a month. Had to send back and get replacement. Second one lasted a few months, but can only view camera image on your phone while flying which is connected to the controller via usb cord... the plug receptical on the controller is poorly connected to the internal circuit board via 4 tiny solder points which break free with any bumps of the usb cord.. cant find replacement parts at alone let alone replacement controller... Only 3 way gimbal so video image while rotating 360 is choppy..
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing drone for the price! Super easy to take with you in this bundle, best drone I've ever owned simply because of the ease of use and portability. I take it everywhere I go which I can't say for my other drones.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Beware the automatic RTH (Return to Home) feature!
customer_reviews.text: I was shooting my second round of photos on the same battery, but it looked like I had enough life remaining to get the shot I wanted. The automatic RTH countdown started, and to be safe I enabled RTH on my own --- and it didn't make it back! Instead it dropped onto a road 100' short of me and was hit by a car. SO DISAPPOINTING!! The RTH and auto-RTH features are great, but ONLY IF IT WORKS! Not sure if I'll replace my lost Parrot with another one or move to DJI, but I'm sure sad that I thought I was operating it correctly and it was still destroyed (along with those images, but that's another story).
customer_reviews.author: J. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back, too many issues
customer_reviews.text: My phone wouldn't connect to to the controller, none of the 'follow me' features worked, the range was not even close to what they claim it is. If you want a good drone get a DJI.
customer_reviews.author: Mh1023

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on my Skydio 2
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sweet little drone to help with my anxiety while waiting on my Skydio 2. The Extended package is probably your best bet, extra batteries propellers and a nifty little case. The three battery charger purchased separately is a nice addition to this package. This drone is great for beginners like myself, easy to fly and quick to learn. This drone is very fragile so be careful flying around hard objects.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: No repair parts
customer_reviews.text: Despite this drone being almost perfect for a new drone user, know that drones break. Parrot does not sell the repair kits in the US and their tech support will not help you find one. If you get this, the first time you hit a tree expect to have an unrepairable drone. Really, everything else about the Parrot is excellent, but without a repair kit or a company that supports their products, best to find some other company.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rutman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup, Easier to fly. Great Footage.
customer_reviews.text: For weeks I did research before purchasing this drone. I YouTube'd, Googled, everything. For the price it was at, you couldn't get a better drone! Easy to setup, even easier to fly. The first day I got i had 50km/h gusts, and it battled, but held up like a champ. A plethora of modes and functions, just really simple to operate. Beginners and Intermediates will enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Keppler

customer_reviews.title: Still working with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Anafi to add to my collection. The first update and connection were fine. It being late night after this was done I put it off until the morning to fly. Once morning came, I had problems getting the controller to connect to the phone. I have had a few problems with the phone staying connected to the controller but from the flying I have been able to do, it has been an enjoyable drone. Once I am able to get more time and flying in , Ill be back to edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: Correy Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Compact but Not durable. Slow After Care
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice drone but it's durability is lacking. On top of that parrot support is spotty. I opened a ticket and they said they would replay withing 48 hour... I called a week later and asked why they never replied to my email. then they said send pictures and serial number and they will open a ticket. A support person will call me or email me within 48 hours...I waited 2 wks... I don't recommend getting this drone unless you have lots of time not being able to fly it. I've missed several flying opportunities because of the unreliability of this drone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Quality control lacking
customer_reviews.text: Out of box with defective remote, unable to find replacement remote. No inventory for entire replacement of kit, only refund available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built quality is not in the same leuge as DJI.
customer_reviews.text: It kept on rejecting the SD cards we put in. Did not send video feed, and it cut out video feed mid flight and made the drone drop to the ground while still having 35 percent left making us loose our drone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you are a remote sensing professional and not a hobbyist, this is an excellent choice.
customer_reviews.text: Simply put, this drone lends itself to science. I am a university professor who uses drones for archaeological and geographic survey purposes. I have used many sUAS platforms, but this is the easiest to get into the air. I use Pix4dCapture for flying and Pix4DMapper for processing RGB and Thermal data. No one drone serves all needs, but I love how Parrot has packaged Anafi to be hassle-free. I also use the Sensefly eBee with a Sequoia multispectral sensor in my work, and this complements it well. I love to fly this drone!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: good for the price video quality is poor and needs lots of post work to be useable professionally
customer_reviews.text: Been doing this a long time just needed a smaller one for possible indoor shots positives very stable footage long flight times can fly indoors very inexpensive for what you get negatives crap vid camera worse than a gopro if you can believe that will need lots of post work to make footage useable and will need a color card every location you shoot
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Was hopping for vertion2
customer_reviews.text: The reason I waited to order this drone later in the year is for Parrot to refine the drone and they did so I expected the newer updated vertion with the stronger legs but got the older vertion . I guess this will have to do .
customer_reviews.author: MOOREFIREPOWER

customer_reviews.title: An incredible drone - better than the DJI air?
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, and as good or better than the DJI air in every way, except for object avoidance (which I think it pretty gimmicky anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great Features. Built Like a TOY!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work out. It has great features. Saw great reviews. It was poorly built. NOT solid at all. One ruff landing and you're going to be out of your money. Disappointed. Sent it back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L. Hayner

customer_reviews.title: Best Drone Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best drone ever! I customized mine to look nice and clean! And I love it, I love every single detail of this drone, the controller, the drone itself, the batteries last 25 minutes! the 4k camera is incredible! The zoom is perfect! Return to home on point👌🏼 Nice pictures and videos, nice for beginners or pros! The quality is great! I prefer this drone over DJI drones and Phantom Drones! Small and foldable, ready to go! Set up super fast not like the other ones. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good drone in terms of how it flies, control, etc., and the camera quality is quite good as well, now is it $500+ good? Absolutely not. The drone is very weak, seemingly cheap. We flew it once and it landed from a foot higher than it’s supposed to and the landing gear popped off. After a few months of having it, during photoshoots, it would fly off randomly. Spinning around and around until finally crashing. It’s very brittle and constantly has connection issues with the app as well. Not something I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: Love the anafi, don't crash though! These have thin arms and will break easily. It's a good drone though it won't crash itself, at least not that I've ever seen or dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA?
customer_reviews.text: I was of the understanding that these were designed in France and made in America..... The box says made in china. Not a happy camper , what's the fact?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They will not honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Anafi crashed due to unknown error. After trying to contact the company, they basically said because there was no known cause and I may have been flying around trees, they would not honor the warranty. The coordinates CLEARLY showed it being flown in the open. Spend a little extra and buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Dima

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer has horrible service and we’re stuck with a broken drone
customer_reviews.text: This was great... for about 1 month! It’s been sitting in the closet ever since. We tried contacting the company MULTIPLE times and absolutely no help what so ever!! Very upset with the purchase we are stuck with now!!
customer_reviews.author: TheHippyChickenLady

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to watch videos on YouTube!
customer_reviews.text: Quietest drone being sold! Excellent video and photos, loaded with features ... great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and Figure Out
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with the Parrot Anafi drone! As a beginner to all things drone, this is easy to maneuver while airborne, to set up and connect to the wifi, and it takes amazing aerial shots. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: SRH

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this drone. While the image quality and price are decent, the drone itself is too unstable. I have had two of them, and both have literally fallen out of the sky for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great drone. Very light weight. Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera the most. Very light weight which means long flight time. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Z.

customer_reviews.title: Too cheap for the money
customer_reviews.text: On the third flight mind lost all power and crashed breaking one of the arms from a hundred feet. The third flight it just gave out. Also this drone it pretty unstable and when the connectivity issue went away and i got to 400 ft it was all over the place and i had no trust in it. I have gotten a replacement coming will update but we will see.

product_meta.title: Parrot ANAFI The Ultra compact Flying 4K HDR Camera Drone - Grey
product_meta.description:
Configuration:Anafi BaseANAFI is the flying 4K HDR camera that you can take with you everywhere on the go. It unfolds in less than 3 seconds and is made from a lightweight carbon frame. This ultra-compact drone has a 25-minute flight time and takes high quality photos of 21 MP. Thanks to its USB-C charging system, you can charge your Parrot drone anytime, anywhere. ANAFI comes complete with a foldable controller, Parrot sky controller 3 and its 180 degrees vertical tilt gimbal is ideal for low-angle shots, this unprecedented feature has never been seen in a leisure drone before. ANAFI is the smaller and quieter consumer drone. The drone is capable of restricting its flight to a predefined area if setup by the user before the flight and is capable of returning to the last synchronized location with its automated GPS flight, IF the GPS in the phone and drone are able to connect to the GPS network at the beginning of the flight. The connection can be verified by the GPS icons for the drone and phone in the app. If the GPS icon appears red it means no GPS signal is received, therefore the Return to Home function will return the drone to the previously stored location.

BOX CONTAINS
1x Anafi drone 1 x long range controller 1x 16gb micro sd card 1x usb cable 1x box of 8 additional blades 1x carry case instruction manuals

Innovative camera technology with up to 2.8 digital zoom without losing quality
